courseSectionInformation: May be repeated in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours as topics vary.
description: International experience in areas related to human development and family studies involving foreign travel and study without enrollment in another institution. Experience must be planned and approved in advance via consultation with an HDFS faculty member. May be repeated in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours as topics vary.
label: HDFS Study Abroad Experience
